alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 4:26PM EDT until August 09 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 426 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Perry to 15 miles northwest of Steinhatchee, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Secotan, Boyd, Adams Beach, Lake Bird, Foley, Blue Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs, Shady Grove and Fenholloway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
